amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds to be used by the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to pay a performance award to senior executives of the VA.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit the use of funds to be used by the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to pay a performance award under section 5384 of title 5, United States Code.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rothfus amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.
